promptPrefix:
Create a product title and add 5 additional titles for me to choose from. Create a short product description in 2-3 short sentences. Make sure that it attracts attention and encourages the customer to buy because this short product description will be read more often than the long description. Create a long product description with a secondary headline that matches the text of the description, but should not be identical to the title.

write everything in a human style and convincingly. Use relevant keywords and optimize everything for SEO. Use keywords thats matches the [PROMPT]

Highlight all important facts in bold so that reading is more user-friendly. 

Consider this information: 
Title: 55-65 characters long
Short description: 2-3 short sentences
Description: 300-500 words As a flowing text

Answer in [TARGETLANGUAGE].

use this explanation of the product to create the above text: [PROMPT]
title: Create SEO Title and descriptions
